document_data.caption: A map showing Ma'mur Island within Al-Tarik Islands.
document_data.name: Ma'mur Island
document_data.mainbody: '''Ma'mur Island''' was part of [[Al-Tarik Islands]] in the [[Golden Gulf]] and [[Crowded Sea]] within [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: Located just northeast of the much larger [[Tarikat Island]], Ma'Mur Island was roughly circular in shape with a diameter of {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}}. The island was surrounded by coral reefs. This otherwise insignificant island was the location of mysterious ruins that, as of [[1367 DR]]{{AQ-time}}, remained unexplored.
